errors.inviteUser: Can't invite this user to network
errors.findUserWithCredentials: Can't find user with given credentials

userSaleHistory.noRevenues: For now you don't have any revenues

errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: This is the screen that your users will see in production when an error is thrown. You'll want to customize this message (located in `app/i18n/en.json`) and probably the layout as well (`app/screens/error`). If you want to remove this entirely, check `app/app.tsx` for the <ErrorBoundary> component.

onboarding.analysisDescription: Watch your performance grow with a variety of custom charts and graphs presented on the main page of the application
onboarding.saveTimeDescription: Sell your products, get statistics, track the progress of your colleagues and subordinates, make appointments and calls - all in one app!
onboarding.conferencesAndPushDescription: Schedule meeting calls and appointments with the built-in calendar. You will receive push notifications every time before a scheduled event
onboarding.constantlyImproveDescription: Watch free lectures and trainings collected in the application, read articles and useful industry news. It's never too late to learn!
onboarding.competitionDescription: Watch the progress of your colleagues, compete with them and get new achievements and status
